channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: U.S. tariffs on Indian goods are now 50%, a level analysts warn is akin to a trade embargo
item.description: The United States was India's top export destination in 2024, with shipments worth $87.3 billion.

item.description: The testing features safety drivers in the driver’s seat, and began prior to Tesla’s robotaxi launch in Austin.

item.title: For Q2, the size of the VC secondary market reached $61.1 billion, according to PitchBook
item.description: In Q2 2025, the VC direct secondary market in the U.S. was $61.1 billion, according to new data from PitchBook.
